short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and optionally copy verses of the Quran to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to quickly access verses within the Quran. The extension can retrieve either just the Arabic text of the verses or, additionally, the English translation. There are multiple English translations to choose from. Retrieved verses can be copied using the copy button.
